name: FuckMice
description:
There is a win condition. You probably won't reach it. 

Have fun.

Controls:
Arrow keys: movement
Space Bar/Z: shoot
Shift/1 2 3: switch guns if unlocked
F11: fullscreen
Esc: end game

12/31 update: fixed potential source of lag (raised sleep margin)  and allowed for true full screen on 16:9 displays
